short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pangolin automatically calculates and sorts products by unit price (weight, volume, or count).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the best deals on Amazon with ease!

PricePangolin is your dedicated companion for navigating Amazon’s marketplace to ensure you always snag the top deals. While we’re refining our support for Target and Walmart, our focus remains steadfast on Amazon to provide you with an unparalleled shopping experience.

Committed to Conservation: PricePangolin is more than just an app; it’s a pledge to protect our planet’s precious wildlife. Our service is completely free, and in lieu of payment, we encourage you to join us in safeguarding the future of wildlife. If you find value in PricePangolin, consider donating to conservation efforts or volunteering your time to help end the trade of wildlife products, especially for the endangered pangolins.

Your Voice Matters: Your input is vital to our growth. If you have suggestions or need assistance, reach out to us at support@pricepangolin.com. Together, let’s embark on a journey towards a meaningful and sustainable future.
